Preprocessing

postprocessinglib.evaluation.preprocessing Module

The preprocessing module contains all of the functions used alongside the metrics to filter, limit and validate the data before it gets evaluated.

Functions

check_valid_dataframe(observed, simulated)

Check if all observations or simulations are invalid and raise an exception if this is the case.

datetime_to_index(datetime)

Convert the datetime value to index value for use in the dataframe

filter_valid_data(df[, station_num, ...])

Removes the invalid values from a dataframe

is_leap_year(year)

Determines if a year is a leap year

validate_data(observed, simulated)

Ensures that a set of observed and simulated dataframes are valid
